---
title: "Comparing old and new SCEPTRE results"
author: "Tim"
date: "2023-04-24"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
setwd("/Users/timbarry/Desktop/")

sceptre_new <- readRDS("disc_analysis_sceptre_0423.rds") |>
  dplyr::filter(dataset == "papalexi/eccite_screen/gene")
sceptre_old <- readRDS("discovery_results_0423.rds") |>
  dplyr::filter(method == "sceptre",
                dataset == "papalexi/eccite_screen/gene")

# convert factors to characters
sceptre_new$response_id <- as.character(sceptre_new$response_id)
sceptre_new$grna_group <- as.character(sceptre_new$grna_group)

sceptre_old$response_id <- as.character(sceptre_old$response_id)
sceptre_old$grna_group <- as.character(sceptre_old$grna_group)

sceptre_new |> dplyr::arrange(response_id, grna_group) |> head(10)
sceptre_old |> dplyr::arrange(response_id, grna_group) |> head(10)
```
